column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were in town and had to get our Chicago deep dish fix.  After asking around town
column2: we decided on Lou Malnati's.  I really don't get what all the hype is about.  The ingredients were not quality
column3: the cheese was mushy and not stretchy
column4: the crust was flaky like pie crust
column5: the whole thing was unimpressive and not good at all. I had one slice and didn't finish it.  We ordered mozzerella sticks and those were frozen
column6: not even homemade.  Not sure what the fuss is all about but the best thing I had was my drink.
